scripts.build: npm run buildIndex & npm run buildTiles & npm run buildSplit
scripts.buildTiles: mustache data/empathize.data.json templates/tiles.mustache > empathize/index.html; mustache data/define.data.json templates/tiles.mustache > define/index.html; mustache data/ideate.data.json templates/tiles.mustache > ideate/index.html;  mustache data/test.data.json templates/tiles.mustache > test/index.html; mustache data/iterate.data.json templates/tiles.mustache > iterate/index.html;
scripts.buildSplit: mustache data/prototype-home.data.json templates/fullscreen.mustache > prototypes/video.html; mustache data/prototype-one.data.json templates/split.mustache > prototypes/one.html;
